snippet: Hours after Eliot Spitzer attacked him in a television commercial, Scott M. Stringer responded with his own negative spot, invoking the prostitution scandal that forced Mr. Spitzer to resign as governor in 2008.
abstract: Hours after Eliot Spitzer attacked him in a television commercial, Scott M. Stringer responded with his own negative spot, invoking the prostitution scandal that forced Mr. Spitzer to resign as governor in 2008.

headline.main: The Ad Campaign: Stringer Says Spitzer 'Held Himself to a Different Standard'
